attributes.action: review the diuretic treatment of patients with congestive care - diac failure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some patients (cases can be cited) are receiving no immeadiate diuretic treatment after being admitted with breathlessness - a routine and emergency protocol needs to be designed and despatched to all ITU, HDU units and cardio - thoracic wards, clearly outline - dosage, timing and commencement to save lives and reduce morbidity. The petitioner is urging the P.M. to heed the advice of the petitioner and repsond to the findings of her PhD research into improving health services.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
